snippet: BRUE, Fred A. The Queens County Bar Association records with deep sorrow the passing of its distinguished former Executive Director on February 17, 2016 who served the Association with distinction during his tenure. Paul E. Kerson, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: BRUE, Fred A. The Queens County Bar Association records with deep sorrow the passing of its distinguished former Executive Director on February 17, 2016 who served the Association with distinction during his tenure. Paul E. Kerson, President 1/3
